articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Germany
WPK's Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Tajikistan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Germany 
    Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The famous work of leader Kim Jong Il "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was brought out in booklet by the Communist Party of Germany on Sept. 30.
 The work published on Oct. 2, Juche 84 (1995) is an undying great programme for party construction and activities as it proudly reviewed the glorious history of the WPK which paved a new path for building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and indicated ways of developing the WPK into the eternal party of the President.

articles.title: Egyptian Party Supports DPRK Stand on Nuclear Issue
articles.content:
WPK's Founding Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Tajikistan 
    Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea was inaugurated by a decision of the Presidium of the C. C., the Communist Party of Tajikistan on Oct. 1.
 T. B. Karimov, organizational secretary of the Party Central Committee, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The preparatory committee decided that Kim Jong Il's famous work would be published, an article observing the WPK's anniversary be carried on its newspaper and the Central Committee and city and district committees of the Communist Party of Tajikistan would hold colorful events on the occasion.

articles.title: National Seminar on Juche Idea Held in India
articles.content:
Egyptian Party Supports DPRK Stand on Nuclear Issue 
    Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The Misr Arab Socialist Party made public a statement on Oct. 1 in support of the just stand of the DPRK on the nuclear issue.
 The statement noted the party which has followed the six-party talks on the nuclear issue reiterates its view that People's Korea is entitled to have access to nuclear weapons as a means for just self-defence as it is exposed to the threat of the U.S. 
 Now that defying international law, the U.S. has pursued the policy of strength towards those countries opposing its policy it is quire natural for the DPRK to use every possible means for protecting its territorial integrity and its people's rights, the statement noted, and continued:    
 The party supports the just stand of the DPRK to keep means for just self-defence and denounces the stand of the U.S. to resort to aggression, arbitrary practices and oppression.

articles.title: 10-day Film Show Opens
articles.content:
National Seminar on Juche Idea Held in India 
    New Delhi, October 4 (KCNA) -- A national seminar on the Juche idea was held in New Delhi on Sept. 27 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 The secretary general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea said in his keynote report at the seminar that the foundation of the WPK by President Kim Il Sung was a historic event which brought about a fundamental turn in carving out the destiny of the Korean people and carrying out the cause of global independence.
  The WPK is the only party which achieved the unity of the leader and the masses and successfully established the leader's guidance to the popular masses and a revolutionary party which has played a decisive role in ushering in an era of independence, he said, and went on: The WPK is characterized by the fact that it holds President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem, has its own guiding idea and has established its own working system and methods after forming an integral whole with the popular masses and maintained a genuine internationalist  stand.
 The ruling parties of the former Soviet Union and the East European socialist countries ceased to exist but it is only the WPK that has grown stronger and the cause of global independence steadily advanced. This has been possible thanks to the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
 Pointing out that the foundation of the Juche idea by Kim Il Sung and the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il marked events of world historic significance, he added the DPRK looks more dignified thanks to the great idea and politics.
 Then speeches were made by presidents and former vice-presidents of different universities and chiefs of groups for the study of the Juche idea. 
 They were unanimous in stressing that it is hard to find in any other parts of the world such a political party as the WPK serving the people and making revolution. The WPK can do so because it has the great leader and the Juche idea, its guiding idea, they added.    
 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on WPK's Immortal Exploits in Cause of Global Independence
Palestinian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on WPK's Immortal Exploits in Cause of Global Independence 
    Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea has devoted itself and made a great contribution to the human cause of independence, steering the times under the banner of Songun. This is a proud review of the long journey made by it for the last six decades and its immortal exploit to shine long in history. 
 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a signed article. It goes on:
 The exploits performed by the WPK for the human cause of independence precisely mean the feats performed by President  Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. 
 In this period the WPK has regarded ensuring peace and security on the Korean Peninsula as a fundamental requirement for guaranteeing peace and security in the world and made positive efforts to this end, rendering great services for preventing a new world war, a thermonuclear war under the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.    
 Its history is a great history in which it has contributed to the human cause of independence by providing the Songun revolutionary leadership. 
 Its Songun politics is a most effective and just political mode for defending the country and nation and socialism and upholding the human cause of independence. 
 The destiny of the country and nation and that of world peace are decided by the Songun politics in the present times. Now that the high-handed and arbitrary military actions of the imperialists and their moves to disturb peace have reached an extreme phase it is possible to protect the destiny of the country and nation and preserve world peace and security only when they hold aloft the banner of Songun. 
 The reality of Korea eloquently proves this. By pursuing the Songun politics, the WPK has frustrated every vicious move of enemies to isolate and stifle the DPRK and firmly defended the national security and sovereignty and socialism. 
 Thanks to Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership and politics, the reckless offensives of imperialists to pressurize the DPRK have been frustrated and peace and security in this region preserved. It is also the result of his Songun leadership and politics that military clashes and war have been averted in Northeast Asia including the Korean Peninsula and the second Korean war did not break out.    
 The era of Songun means a new higher stage in the efforts to accomplish the human cause of independence. The WPK will as ever remain true to the human cause of independence under the banner of Songun and dynamically struggle for its victory, the article concludes.

articles.title: Dam Project of Nyongwon Power Station Completed
"Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Off Press
Colorful Functions Held in DPRK
articles.content:
"Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Off Press
    Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out the "Complete Collection of    Kim Il Sung's Works" vol. 60, a library of the great Juche idea which carries President Kim Il Sung's famous works systematically and comprehensively in chronological order.
 It contains 31 works including his speeches, concluding speeches and talk from August to December Juche 65 (1976).    
 In many works including "On Strengthening the Self-sustenance of Metallurgical Industry and Increasing Agricultural Production", "Let Us Thoroughly Implement Our Party's Fishing Policy", "On Some Immediate Tasks Arising in the People's Living and Economic Work" he gave a perfect exposition of the theoretical and practical issues arising in the socialist economic construction to boost material wealth of the country and systematically improve the standard of the people's living. 
 In work "On Further Improving the Training of Our Cadres" he clarified the tasks and ways to develop the training of national carders on to a higher stage.
 "Talk to a Delegation from the French Communist Party", "Talk to a Government Delegation of the United Republic of Tanzania" and other works elucidate the Workers' Party of Korea policy of national reunification and the principled issues on the world revolution.    
 Expounded in works are  the principled issues which serve as the guidelines for the revolutionary countries to unite with each other to wage a vigorous struggle against imperialism and build a new world where all the countries and nations lead a free and affluent life free from imperialism, exploitation and oppression.
 The complete collection edits other works clarifying the ideas, theories and policies which give a flawless exposition of the theoretical and practical issues arising in the revolution and construction.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps in DPRK Visit Party Founding Museum
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Polish Ambassador
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps in DPRK Visit Party Founding Museum
    Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here visited the Party Founding Museum on Wednesday on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
 Members of the corps looked round historic materials and mementos on display, being briefed on the facts that right after the liberation of the country President Kim Il Sung founded the party on the firm organizational and ideological basis of party founding and brilliant revolutionary tradition established in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and strengthened and developed it as a revolutionary and popular one taking root among the working class and the popular masses. 
 Nguyen Van Chau, military attache of the Vietnamese embassy, wrote in the visitor's book that through the visit he came to know well about the energetic activities of Kim Il Sung to develop the WPK into a popular and revolutionary one. 
 Yang Xilian, military attache of the Chinese embassy, said that Kim Il Sung laid the firm organizational and ideological foundation for building a party from the first period when he embarked on the road of revolutionary struggle and that the WPK founded by him performed brilliant feats in the struggle to build socialism for 60 years in the past.

articles.title: Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Polish Ambassador
    Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday received credentials from Polish Ambassador to the DPRK Roman Iwaszkiewicz at the Mansudae Assembly Hall. 
 On hand were Vice Foreign Minister Kung Sok Ung and staff members of the Polish embassy here.    
 The president had a talk with the ambassador after receiving his credentials.

articles.title: Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il
Artificial Lake Paekma
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory letter by the economic and commercial councillors' corps here on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 They were conveyed to an official concerned today by Evelio Duenas Ponce, commercial councillor of the Cuban embassy here who is doyen of the corps.

articles.title: Stream of People Visit Monument to Party Founding
articles.content:
Artificial Lake Paekma
    Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Lake Paekma, an artificial one, has come into being in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
 Lake Paekma for the Paekma-Cholsan waterway is located at the foot of Mt. Paekma in Phihyon County, North Phyongan Province. Its source of water is the Samgyo River.
 It is the largest irrigation reservoir with a capacity of reserving hundreds of millions of cubic meters of water in the country.    
 The waterway with a gravity-fed irrigation system fully irrigates more than 40,000 hectares of cultivated land in six cities and counties including Ryongchon, Yomju and Cholsan counties and Sinuiju City of North Phyongan Province.
 The lake has the main, subsidiary and overflow dams and an intake structure. In particular, the overflow dam has been built in a unique form.
 The builders have done a huge amount of work and constructed the lake as a grand monumental edifice in the spirit of revolutionary optimism of going through the thorny path.    
 Leader Kim Jong Il named it Lake Paekma.
